schedule.author: Dario Belić
schedule.author_desc: Freelance photographer and videographer, student of photography at Academy of Dramatic Art in Zagreb.
schedule.title: Where is the beginning of our private space?
schedule.description: Using unprotected, easily accessible IP cameras I capture people and situations in their private space. Behind the cameras are people, individuals who live their lives and do not even realize they are being watched.

schedule.author: UNIN
schedule.author_desc: Lucija was born in Zagreb in 1994 where she also finished secondary school of Graphic design. After it she started her studies of Media design at Sveuciliste Sjever in Koprivnica. Painting and street art are her main art focuses. Marko is also into visual art and urban exploring. He studies at University North at Koprivnica.
schedule.title: Student project: Submarine
schedule.description: Art pieces are very often considered as an objects and not as a complete experiences. Authors wanted to present them as an experience triggers by ‘completing’ them with sound and animation.
